title: Vampire mage
data:
***Version [0.28](/0.28 "0.28")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all vampires, see [list of vampires](/List_of_vampires "List of vampires").*

| vampire mage V [![Vampire mage.png](/images/9/94/Vampire_mage.png)](/File:Vampire_mage.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                              | 36-74                                                                                                                                                                                                                       |

| [XP](/XP "XP")                                                                              | 854                                                                                                                                                                                                                         |

| Attack1                                                                                     | 15 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                           |
| Attack2                                                                                     | 15 ([bite](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [vampiric](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                                                       |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                     | [rC+](/Cold "Cold") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment")                                 |
| [Vulnerabilities](/Vulnerability "Vulnerability")                                           | [Holy](/Holy "Holy")                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Habitat](/Habitat "Habitat")                                                               | Land                                                                                                                                                                                                                        |
| [Intelligence](/Monster_intelligence "Monster intelligence")                                | [Human](/Category:Human_intelligence "Category:Human intelligence")                                                                                                                                                         |
| [Uses](/Item_usage "Item usage")                                                            | [Weapons & armour](/Category:Weapons_armour "Category:Weapons armour") [Starting equipment](/Item_usage "Item usage") [Open doors](/Category:Open_doors "Category:Open doors")                                              |
| [Holiness](/Holiness "Holiness")                                                            | [Undead](/Category:Undead_holiness "Category:Undead holiness")                                                                                                                                                              |

| Flags                                                                                       | [Evil](/Evil "Evil") [See invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible") [Flying](/Flying "Flying") [Unbreathing](/Unbreathing "Unbreathing") [Speaks](/Speaks "Speaks") [Warm-blooded](/Blood_temperature "Blood temperature") |

|   |                                                                                                                                                                               |
| - | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
|   | A sorcerer who, by accident or design, has been afflicted with the curse of the vampire. Regardless, through undeath, this wizard has finally mastered the art of dark magic. |

## Useful Info

**Vampire magi** are irritating [undead](/Undead "Undead") casters who hound you with summoned undead allies and [draining](/Draining "Draining") bolts. Although only slightly stronger physically than a standard [vampire](/Vampire_\(monster\) "Vampire (monster)"), their spells are much more irritating. They can be found throughout [the Crypt](/The_Crypt "The Crypt").

## Spells

| Spell set I |                                                                    |                                                     |
| :---------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------ | --------------------------------------------------- |
| Slot1       | [Bolt of Draining](/Bolt_of_Draining "Bolt of Draining") (3d18)    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot2       | [Summon Undead](/Summon_Undead "Summon Undead")                    | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot3       | [Invisibility](/Invisibility "Invisibility")                       | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |
| Slot4       | [Vampiric Draining](/Vampiric_Draining "Vampiric Draining") (4-29) | [Wizard flag](/Spell_slot_flags "Spell slot flags") |

## Tips & Tricks

- [Negative energy](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") resistance seriously hampers their ability to damage you.
html:
Vampire mage

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.28: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all vampires, see list of vampires.

vampire mage V 
HP 36-74
HD 10
XP 854
Speed 10
AC 12
EV 10
Will 80
Attack1 15 (hit: plain)
Attack2 15 (bite: vampiric)


Resistances rC+
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Undead
Size Medium
Type vampire, vampire
Flags Evil
See invisible
Flying
Unbreathing
Speaks
Warm-blooded
A sorcerer who, by accident or design, has been afflicted with the curse of the vampire. Regardless, through undeath, this wizard has finally mastered the art of dark magic.

Useful Info

Vampire magi are irritating undead casters who hound you with summoned undead allies and draining bolts. Although only slightly stronger physically than a standard vampire, their spells are much more irritating. They can be found throughout the Crypt.

Spells

Spell set I
Slot1 Bolt of Draining (3d18) Wizard flag
Slot2 Summon Undead Wizard flag
Slot3 Invisibility Wizard flag
Slot4 Vampiric Draining (4-29) Wizard flag

Tips & Tricks

  • Negative energy resistance seriously hampers their ability to damage you.
